original_title: I tried to shout with them
overview: France, Strasbourg, 2019, an immigrated Iranian woman, who is an art student, floating through and observing her new life while she is still attached to her past. Lost in the past and present of her personal, social and political lives, she struggles to understand and survive in the paradoxical parallel worldsâ€¦ living somewhere in between.
title: I tried to shout with them
